verse.name: v1
verse.lines: To the regions beyond I must go, I must go, Where the story has never been told; To the millions that never have heard of His love, I must tell the sweet story of old.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: To the regions beyond I must go, I must go, Till the world, all the world, His salvation shall know.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: To the hardest of places He calls me to go, Never thinking of comfort or ease; The world may pronounce me a dreamer, a fool, Enough if the Master I please.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Oh, ye that are spending your leisure and pow'rs In those pleasures so foolish and fond; Awake from your selfishness, folly and sin, And go to the regions beyond.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: There are other “lost sheep” that the Master must bring, And to them must the message be told; He sends me to gather them out of all lands, And welcome them back to His fold.
